frame.name: Membership
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Member</fen> is semi-permanently part of a socially constructed <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex><fex name="mm">Victor</fex> <m>is</m> <t>part</t> <fex name="Group">of the Red Crescent</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Member
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who belongs to a <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex>Two <t><fex name="Member">members</fex></t> of the Red Cross were here about a donation </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Group
FE.definition: <def-root>A set of people standing in a semi-permanent relationship together.</def-root>

FE.name: Standing
FE.definition:
<def-root>An indication of the <fen>Member</fen>'s status within the <fen>Group</fen>.
<ex>Bill is a <fex name="std">full</fex> <t>member</t> of the Elks.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the inclusion event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Member</fen> is a member of the <fen>Group</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the membership relationship holds.</def-root>
